column4: Second day on Linux. There's a long command I've been using to open a program with, like, parameters and stuff. I know I'll be doing this regularly. I hear tell of "scripts," or something akin. First off, am I hallucinating? Second off, how do I make one if, in fact, they are not akin to Ogopogo? :)
scguy: I dunno. I've been punching it into the terminal up until now; something I could click would be nice.
you mean like for command line stuff? or just for starting programs?
